name: BIONICLE: Kanohi Klash
description:
A 1-on-1 2D fighting game based on the LEGO BIONICLE toyline.

Currently in development. v0.3 is due by mid-2023.

Two characters are playable: Tahu, the Toa of Fire, and Gali, the Toa of Water.

Powered by MUGEN 1.1. Future versions will be based in IKEMEN Go.

Controls are set up by default to use any XInput controller. Default keyboard controls are as follows:

P1 - WASD, UIO = punches, JKL = kicks, Enter = start

P2 - Arrows, Num789 = punches, Num456 = kicks, NumEnter = start

Credits, changes, and movelists are found within the zip file.

Characters © The Lego Group

All characters and concepts belong to their respective owners.

M.U.G.E.N. © Elecbyte
